name: Daybringer (itch)
description:
Daybringer is a Hip-hop Fantasy Adventure!

*Best enjoyed with a gamepad!

Requirements:

-Windows OS

-4GB Ram

-Dedicated Graphics Card

-for the best experience it is recommended to play with a GAMEPAD

*This game is still in early development and you may experience some bugs or performance issues.   For best results use a gamepad and play on a PC with a dedicated GPU. 

Thank you for playing!  To support us visit www.daybgame.com and sign up to receive updates.  Any and all feedback is welcome!

Please email samuelrl86@gmail.com directly for business inquiries.
